## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I'm interested in mining VerusCoin. What types of hardware can be used to mine it?

**AI Assistant:**
VerusCoin can be mined using a variety of hardware options, including CPUs, GPUs, FPGAs, and even ARM devices. However, CPUs are the most efficient option, and they substantially outperform GPUs. Do you have any specific hardware in mind?

**User:**
That's good to know. What are some popular mining software options for VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
Some popular mining software options for VerusCoin include ccminer for CPU and GPU mining, and nheqminer for Windows, Linux, and MacOS. These software options can help you get started with mining VerusCoin. Do you have any experience with mining software?

**User:**
I'm not sure which one to choose. Where can I find a comparison of hashrates for different mining software and hardware?

**AI Assistant:**
You can find a spreadsheet to compare hashrates for different mining software and hardware at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RrSYJDV0Mjj3X-myMC3aQDGkcipivxHsD7ZxJ3r5f_A/edit#gid=201266774. This spreadsheet should give you a good idea of which software and hardware combinations are the most efficient for mining VerusCoin.

**User:**
Got it, thanks! What are some popular mining pools for VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
Some popular mining pools for VerusCoin include pool.verus.io, luckpool.net, zergpool.com, and several others. You can search online for a full list of mining pools to find one that suits your needs. Do you have any experience with mining pools?

**User:**
No, I don't. What are some popular staking pools for VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
Some popular staking pools for VerusCoin include Ginasis Staking pool, Dudezmobi Staking pool, and aacoin.com, which technically stakes your VRSC on the exchange. Staking pools can be a great way to earn passive income with your VerusCoin. Do you have any VerusCoin to stake?

**User:**
Yeah, I do. What's the current price of VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
You can find the current price of VerusCoin at veruspay.io/price/. This should give you an idea of the current market value of your VerusCoin.

**User:**
Thanks! Are there any popular exchanges where I can trade VerusCoin?

**AI Assistant:**
Yes, some popular exchanges where you can trade VerusCoin include STEX, Safe Trade, AACoin, Graviex, AtomicDEX, and Kuangex. These exchanges can be a great way to buy or sell VerusCoin. Do you have any experience with cryptocurrency exchanges?

What types of hardware can be used to mine VerusCoin?
VerusCoin can be mined using CPUs, GPUs, FPGAs, and even ARM devices. However, CPUs are the most efficient option, and they substantially outperform GPUs.

VerusCoin can be mined with CPUs, GPUs and FPGAs, solo and in pools. However, the algo is carefully designed for CPUs, and they still substantially outrange GPUs.
ARM mining works in general, but although fairly efficient, without high hashrates. FPGAs can mine this coin, but don't outperform CPUs by much.##### Miners:
Besides solo-mining with Verus Desktop or CLI wallet, you can use:
ccminer for CPU (efficient for most modern CPUs) or GPU https://github.com/monkins1010/ccminer/releases;
nheqminer https://github.com/VerusCoin/nheqminer/releases (for Windows, Linux, and MacOS);A spreadsheet to compare hashrates can be found here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RrSYJDV0Mjj3X-myMC3aQDGkcipivxHsD7ZxJ3r5f_A/edit#gid=201266774
You can also compare older and current algos##### Mining pools:
https://pool.verus.io/ (fees will go to VERUS foundation)
https://luckpool.net/verus
https://zergpool.com/
https://vrsc.mcmpool.eu/
https://wattpool.net/
https://www.nlpool.nl/
https://vrsc.dev-codex.com/
http://vrsc.52hash.com/
https://vrsc.ciscotech.dk/
http://www.lepool.com.cn:8088/
https://zpool.ca/
http://verus.bcmonster.com/#### Staking pools:
https://discord.gg/4FJJRY5 (Ginasis Staking pool, 5% fee)
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Up1WbMuCR21e6TxLae6zjLJePu_RIOVZwqShRj9vVvc/edit?usp=sharing (Dudezmobi Staking pool, 1% fee)
https://www.aacoin.com/#/trade?symbol=VRSC_BTC (Technically not a pool, but it stakes your VRSC on the exchange, 20% fee)Price: https://veruspay.io/price/#### Exchanges:
https://app.stex.com/de/trade/pair/BTC/VRSC/1D
https://safe.trade/trading/vrscbtc
https://www.aacoin.com/#/trade?symbol=VRSC_BTC
https://graviex.net/markets/vrscbtc
https://atomicdex.io/ (in Beta)
